name: Cowcellur
description:
Cowcellur is a sandbox of cells, which duplicate, die and live, but you can interfere, posing dangers.

-See cell evolutions, of some types and colors!

-Put predators, and explosions!

-Insert more than 100 types of cells!

-Drag and place multiple cells together!

-Have +1000 combinations!

The game is a prototype, that is, maybe it will be more complete :)

_______________________________________________________________________________

Special Controls

Enter= make explosions

Space = makes cell eaters

_______________________________________________________________________________
